archimate:WorkPackage.name: Security Control Program
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation: Program for The Security Baseline 2022 scope. Included SCREW 1 and 2 in H1 2022 and in Q4 2022 will include three work packages Security Baseline Gap Analysis for HiaaS and OCP, Standard Security Assessment Process Development and Security Baseline Release 3. Owned by Connect CISO Mikael Lingskog. For more details refer to Security Baseline Q422 work package structure view and the work package definitions for the three subprojects (linked in the work package structure view).
